All Classes

Class
Description
ActivitiesFilterPanel
Class that represents panel in which filters for activities search are chosen.
Activity
Class that represents an activity(income or expense).
ActivityManager
Class that handles operations tied with activities.
ActivityModel
Class that creates a model to be used when displaying activities.
AddActivityPanel
Class that represents a panel which is used for adding a new activity.
AddCurrencyBalancePanel
Class that represents panel used for adding a new currency.
Balance
Class that represents balance(how much money in which currency at given time)
BalanceManager
Class that handles operations tied with balances.
BalanceModel
Class that creates a model to be used when displaying balances.
BalancesFilterPanel
Class that represents a panel which is used for choosing filters for balances' filtering.
BalancesGraphPanel
 
ChooseFolderPanel
 
CurrencyManager
Class that handles operations tied with currencies.
DatabaseManager
Class that directly communicates with the database.
DateLabelFormatter
Class which formats date selected in JDatePickerImpl
Display
Class used for formatting various outputs.
DisplayActivitiesPanel
Class that represents panel used for displaying filtered activities.
DisplayBalancesPanel
Class that represents panel used for displaying filtered balances.
GroupActivitiesPanel
Class that displays pie chart of grouped activities.
HomePanel
Class that represents home panel, from which other activities are launched.
LookAndFeelManager
Class that handles LookAndFeel and dimension change.
Main
Program's entry point.
MainFrame
Class that encompasses all other panels and controls conditions which need to be met in order for panels to be displayed.
ManagerFactory
Factory of managers.
Observer
Class that represents an observer.
Publisher
Class that is used when implementing the Observer design pattern.
ResourceManager
Class that handles outside resources(such as icons).
SettingsManager
Class that handles all settings relevant for the app.
SettingsPanel
Class that represents a panel used for changing app's settings, such as LookAndFeel and language.
UpdateEvent
Class that represents an event which Publisher sends its Observer when Publisher.notifyObservers() is called.
Util
Class that has static util methods for parsing and formatting.
WelcomePanel
Class that represents simple welcome screen.
